column1: Funeral services will take place on Monday
column3: 2015 at 10:15 a.m. at Cederberg Funeral Home of Frankenmuth
column4: 590 N. Franklin St. and 11:00 a.m. at St. Lorenz Lutheran Church. Rev. Caleb Adams will officiate with burial between services in St. Lorenz Lutheran Cemetery.
